name: Galahad

ski.name: BLADE CHARGE
desc: Hurls blade in a target direction, pulling Galahad toward any enemy or terrain hit to deal physical damage and Stun for 1 second. Hitting terrain reduces ability cooldown by 4 seconds.
study: Pulls Galahad beside target unit hit

ski.name: DEATH MARKED
desc: Increases Movement Speed, imbuing next basic attack within 5 seconds with bonus damage and Death. Death lasts 3 seconds.
study: Increases Movement Speed and improves basic attack

ski.name: DEATH ZONE
desc: Erects a Death Zone around Galahad, dealing magical damage to enemy units passing through and slowing movement by 50% while marking for Death. Lasts 3 seconds. Enemies passing through multiple Death Zones receive half Death Zone damage, while enemies marked for Death are Stunned for 1.5 seconds when passing through Death Zone. Maximum duration of Death Zone is 3 seconds. Galahad takes 30% less damage when in Death Zone. While active, basic attacks reset cooldown for Blade Charge.
data: 0.5s Blade Charge Cooldown Reduction per Basic Attack
study: Creates a Death Zone that damages and slows controls enemy units

ski.name: DEATHFIRE
desc: Galahad unleashes a deathfire, dealing magical damage to target units and restoring 50% as health. Deals bonus damage and causes 1 second of Fear to target if already marked for Death, plus deals damage to enemy units within 400 range. Fear: units flee away in opposite direction, losing all control during duration.

story: Galahad was for a time known as "The Kingdom's Star of Hope", but people's misunderstanding and misjudgment pushed him to the darkness. Destruction is now his pleasure. Shrouded in the shadow of death, the people pray frailly for the returning of their lost bright Knight of Light.
